titles.title: A bill to provide disaster assistance to producers for certain losses due to freezing conditions in 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2034)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 2/28/1994--Introduced. Amends Federal law to provide disaster assistance for orchard, forest, livestock, and dairy losses suffered in 1994 due to certain freezing conditions.
